removeAccountDetails: Das Zurücksetzen wird dein Konto von diesem Gerät entfernen. Dein Guthaben bleibt im Konto, wird aber nur mit deiner Wiederherstellungsphrase erreichbar sein
requirePinOnAppOpen: PIN beim Öffnen der App erforderlich
shareAnalytics_detail: Wir sammeln anonymisierte Daten darüber, wie du {{appName}} verwendest, um die Anwendung für alle zu verbessern.
dataSaverDetail: Der Datensparmodus ermöglicht die Kommunikation mit dem Celo Netzwerk über einen vertrauenswürdigen Knoten. Du kannst diesen Modus jederzeit in den App-Einstellungen ändern.

restartModalSwitchOff.body: Um Datensparmodus immer wieder ein- und auszuschalten, musst du die App neu starten und zu diesem Bildschirm zurückkehren.

promptFornoModal.body: Uns ist aufgefallen, dass du Probleme bei der Verbindung hast. Wir empfehlen dir, den Data Saver Modus zu aktivieren, damit du {{appName}} weiterhin mit intermittierender Verbindung verwenden kannst.

accountKeyModal.header: Ohne deine Wiederherstellungsphrase verlierst du den Zugriff auf dein Guthaben für immer
accountKeyModal.body1: Um Valora zurückzusetzen, musst du bestätigen, dass du deine Wiederherstellungsphase geschrieben hast.
accountKeyModal.body2: Niemand, nicht einmal Valora, kann dein Konto ohne deine Phrase wiederherstellen.

promptConfirmRemovalModal.header: Bist du dir sicher, dass du Valora zurücksetzen möchtest?
promptConfirmRemovalModal.body: Du wirst nicht mehr auf deine Guthaben oder deine Wiederherstellungsphrase von diesem Gerät aus zugreifen können. Es gibt keine Möglichkeit, deine Wiederherstellungsphrase wiederherzustellen, wenn du sie nicht aufgeschrieben hast.

promptConfirmRevokeModal.header: Bist Du sicher, dass du dein Valora-Konto widerrufen möchtest?
promptConfirmRevokeModal.body: Einmal widerrufen, kann dieses Konto nicht widerrufen werden. Nur widerrufen, wenn du sicher bist, dass du dieses Konto nie mehr benötigst.

name: Name
contactText: Findest du nicht das, wonach du suchst?
contactMessagePlaceholder: Bitte gib deine Nachricht hier ein...
supportLegalCheckbox: Durch das Versenden stimme ich zu, die obigen Informationen und alle angehängten Anmeldeprotokolldaten mit {{appName}} Support zu teilen.
contactSuccess: Dein Problem wurde erfolgreich gemeldet! Erwarte in Kürze eine E-Mail-Antwort!
namePictureSaved: Dein Name und Bild wurden erfolgreich gespeichert.
verifyNumberToRaiseLimit: Du kannst dein Sendelimit erhöhen, indem du deine Identität überprüfst. Bitte bestätige deineTelefonnummer, bevor du fortfährst.
verifyIdentityToRaiseLimit: Du kannst dein Sendelimit erhöhen, indem du deine Identität bestätigst. Bitte gib im folgenden Prozess einige Details an.
applicationInReviewDescription: Deine Bewerbung wird überprüft. Du wirst benachrichtigt, sobald dieser Vorgang abgeschlossen ist.
applicationIncompleteDescription: Die von Dir zur Verfügung gestellten Informationen waren unzureichend. Bitte sei bereit, im folgenden Prozess weitere Details anzugeben.
applicationDeniedDescription: Deine Bewerbung wurde abgelehnt. Wenn du der Meinung bist, dass dies ein Fehler war, starte bitte den folgenden Prozess neu.
applicationCompletedDescription: Deine Bewerbung wurde akzeptiert. Du kannst jetzt täglich einen unbegrenzten Betrag senden.
raiseLimitEmailBody: Ich möchte eine Erhöhung des Tageslimits von {{dailyLimit}} {{appName}} für Adresse {{address}} beantragen
raiseLimitEmailSuccess: Deine Bewerbung wurde erfolgreich gemeldet! Erwarte in Kürze eine E-Mail-Antwort!
raiseLimitEmailNotSent: Deine Bewerbung wurde nicht gesendet. Bitte versuche es erneut.
storeRecoveryTitle: Du musst dein Konto erneut einrichten
storeRecoveryBody: Es ist ein Fehler aufgetreten. Wir sind uns des Problems bewusst und arbeiten daran, es zu beheben. In der Zwischenzeit musst du den Setup-Prozess erneut durchlaufen.
shakeForSupport: Dieses Menü erscheint, wenn du dein Gerät schüttelst.
introBody:
Deine Wiederherstellungsphrase ist der wichtigste Teil deines Kontos.

Bitte finde einen privaten Ort, um deine Phrase einzurichten. Es dauert etwa fünf Minuten.
backupSetupBody: Um dein Guthaben zu schützen, musst du deine Wiederherstellungsphrase einrichten, bevor du mit {{appName}} fortfahren kannst.
postSetupBody: Wenn du deine Wiederherstellungsphrase verlierst, verlierst du den Zugriff auf alle deine Celo Dollar und CELO. Niemand, nicht einmal {{appName}}, wird dir helfen können, dein Konto ohne deine Wiederherstellungsphrase wiederherzustellen. Bewahre es an einem sicheren Ort und teile es nicht.
backupKeyNotification: Deine Wiederherstellungsphrase ist der wichtigste Teil deines Kontos
backupKeySummary: Finde einen privaten Ort und schreibe deine Wiederherstellungsphrase auf. Bitte speichere ihn an einem sicheren Ort. Speichere ihn nicht in deinem Telefon.
savedConfirmation: Ja, ich habe meine Phrase aufgeschrieben.
backupQuizWordCount: Was ist das <0>{{ordinal}}</0> Wort deiner Wiederherstellungsphrase?
backupQuizFailed: Die Wiederherstellungsphrase ist falsch. Bitte versuche es erneut.
invalidWordsInBackupPhrase: Einige Wörter in der Wiederherstellungsphrase sind ungültig: {{ invalidWords }}

backupComplete.1: Als nächstes kannst du Safeguards einrichten.

cancelDialog.title: Schließe das Einrichten deiner Wiederherstellungsphrase ab
cancelDialog.body:
Deine Wiederherstellungsphrase ist extrem wichtig. Ohne eine Phrase kannst du den Zugriff auf dein Wallet für immer verlieren.
Du wirst vom Senden von Transaktionen blockiert, bis du die Einrichtung deiner Wiederherstellungsphrase abgeschlossen hast.

backupPhrasePlaceholder: horse leopard dog monkey shark tiger lemur whale squid wolf squirrel mouse lion elephant cat shrimp bear penguin deer turtle fox zebra goat giraffe

guide.title: Deine Wiederherstellungsphrase ist eine spezielle Art von Passwort
guide.text: Deine Wiederherstellungsphrase ist die einzige Möglichkeit, auf dein Konto zuzugreifen.

guide.title: Ohne deine Wiederherstellungsphrase kannst Du den Zugriff für immer verlieren
guide.text: Wenn Du dein Telefon verlierst, musst du deine Wiederherstellungsphrase haben, um dein Konto zurück zu bekommen. Niemand, nicht einmal {{appName}}, wird in der Lage sein, dein Saldo ohne es wiederherzustellen.

guide.title: Notiere es
guide.text: Schreibe deine Wiederherstellungsphrase auf und speichere sie an einem sicheren Ort. Speichere sie nicht auf deinem Telefon.

guide.title: Behalte deine Phrase privat
guide.text: Jeder mit deiner Phrase hat Zugriff auf dein Konto und alle Guthaben. Teile es nicht mit anderen.

customerIncentivesSummary: Supercharge ist da! Erhalte {{percent}}% jährliche Belohnungen auf dein {{currency}} Saldo. Nur für kurze Zeit, also starte deine Einzahlung!

earnWeekly.text: Sende und gib aus wie gewohnt und erhalte Belohnungen auf den verbleibenden Saldo.

noMinCommitment.earningText: Du brauchst nur einen Saldo von mindestens {{minBalance}} {{currency}}, um Belohnungen zu bekommen.
noMinCommitment.connectText: Du brauchst nur einen Saldo von mindestens {{minBalance}} {{currency}} und deine Telefonnummer zu bestätigen, um Belohnungen zu bekommen.

saveMoreEarnMore.text: Mache eine Anzahlung von {{maxBalance}} {{currency}} um deine {{percent}}% jährliche Belohnungen auszuschöpfen.

conclusion: Das ist so einfach. Lade deine Krypto noch heute auf!
shareInfo: Diese Anwendung wird auf folgende Informationen zugreifen können:
firebaseDisabled: Firebase ist deaktiviert, Benachrichtigung und Log-Upload funktionieren nicht
whatIsGold: Mit {{appName}} kannst du CELO kaufen und verkaufen
notEnoughDollars: Nicht genug Celo Dollar zum umtauschen
exchangeRateChange: Umtauschkurs hat sich geändert, erneut versuchen
feeExchangeEducation:
Beim Austausch zwischen CELO und cUSD wird eine geringe Gebühr dafür verwendet, den Wert des Celo Dollar stabil zu halten und an den US-Dollar gebunden zu sein. 

Besuche die FAQ um mehr zu erfahren.
rateInfoBody: Dein Betrag könnte sich je nach Marktbedingungen ändern. Dein Endbetrag wird nicht mehr als 1% anders sein als der angezeigte Wert.
noExchanges: Es gibt keine Börsen für {{digitalAsset}} in deiner Region
cashOutSubtitle: Gib für Geschenkgutscheine und andere Käufe aus oder sende Krypto an einen Kryptobörse
spendSubtitle: Use your balance with supporting merchants
tapToCopyCeloDollarsAddress: Tap to copy your {{appName}} CUSD address
dollarsNotYetEnabledNote: Celo Dollars are not yet available on any providers. To get Celo Dollars, purchase CELO and exchange it for Celo Dollars in the CELO tab.
receiveWithBidali: Gift Cards and Mobile Top Up

fundingEducationDialog.title: Funding your {{appName}}
fundingEducationDialog.body:
{{appName}} is powered by the Celo Network. {{appName}} runs on Celo Dollars (cUSD), a stable digital currency tracking the US Dollar.

To fund your {{appName}} wallet, purchase cUSD from one of the 3rd party providers available in your location. For more information please visit <0>{{link}}</0>

cashOutEducationDialog.title: Withdraw from {{appName}}
cashOutEducationDialog.body:
{{appName}} is powered by the Celo Network. {{appName}} runs on Celo Dollars (cUSD), a stable digital currency tracking the US Dollar.

To withdraw your {{appName}} balance, sell cUSD with one of the 3rd party providers available in your location. For more information please visit <0>{{link}}</0>

explanationModal.title: About Providers
explanationModal.body: Providers allow you to add or withdraw funds from your account. They determine their own rates and restrictions depending on various factors. Please visit the provider’s website for specific help.

invalidAmountDialog.minAmount: Our providers do not support totals smaller than {{usdLimit}}{{localLimit}}. Please enter a larger amount.
invalidAmountDialog.maxAmount: Our providers do not support totals larger than {{usdLimit}}{{localLimit}}. Please enter a smaller amount.

dailyLimitDialog.body: You are about to purchase more than your daily send limit of {{limit}}. Please contact <0>{{contactEmail}}</0> if you want to raise your daily send limit.

providerFeesDialog.title: Provider Fees
providerFeesDialog.body1: Provider fees are set by each provider individually and include an exchange fee and liquidity fee, among others. To learn more please visit

providerFeeDiscountDialog.title: Fee Discount
providerFeeDiscountDialog.body: As a promotion, fees are temporarily subsidized to celebrate the launch of Valora!

dailyLimitRequest: Hi! I'd like to increase my daily send limit please.
pleaseSelectProvider: Please select a provider below. These links connect to a third party service.
otherFundingOptions: For more ways to add and withdraw funds, visit <0>How to fund your account</0>
youCanTransferIn: You can transfer {{digitalAsset}} from any exchange that supports {{digitalAsset}}. You'll need your Account Address.
youCanTransferOut: You can transfer {{digitalAsset}} to any exchange that supports {{digitalAsset}}. Once you have retrieved your address you can continue to the next step.
useBalanceWithMerchants: Use your balance with supporting merchants

cicoSuccess.title: Order submitted!
cicoSuccess.bodyWithProvider: {{provider}} is processing your order. You should receive your funds within a couple of days.
cicoSuccess.bodyWithoutProvider: The service provider is processing your order. You should receive your funds within a couple of days.

contractKitInitFailed: Failed to initialize the contract kit, please try restarting the app or emailing support.
web3FailedToSync: Failing to sync, check your network connection

addressLookupFailure: Failed to look up phone number address

The daily limit is {{dailyLimitcUSD}} cUSD ({{currencySymbol}}{{dailyLimit}})

addressValidationError: The account information entered was not valid

providerFetchFailed: Could not connect to service. Please contact support
cashOutLimitExceeded: You cannot cash out more than your balance of {{balance}} {{currency}}
appDescription: A mobile payments wallet that works worldwide

goldEducationSteps.title: What is CELO?
goldEducationSteps.text: CELO is a digital currency that keeps the Celo Dollar (cUSD) stable.

goldEducationSteps.title: CELO’s price changes
goldEducationSteps.text: If more people use the Celo Dollar, the value of CELO increases. Unlike CELO, the Celo Dollar doesn't change in value.

goldEducationSteps.title: Shape the Celo Network
goldEducationSteps.text: By holding CELO, you have the ability to vote for changes and features you’d like to see on the Celo Network.

goldEducationSteps.title: Please buy and sell responsibly
goldEducationSteps.text: {{appName}} allows you to buy and sell CELO. CELO presents a risk of financial loss, please exercise caution.

whySendFees: This fee covers costs for the new user to connect their phone number
whyReceiveFees: You were sent some money to confirm your account
inviteAnyone: Send easily to your friends by adding your contacts

inviteDialog.title: Invite a Friend
inviteDialog.body: Connect and share value with your friends and family on Valora.

inviteAndSendDialog.title: We'll hold on to your payment to {{name}}
inviteAndSendDialog.body: Share an invitation message with {{name}} to join Valora. Once they join & connect a phone number, they'll receive your payment.

inviteRewardsBanner.title: Get {{amount}} {{currency}} by sharing Valora with a friend!
inviteRewardsBanner.body: Earn {{amount}} {{currency}} when you send money to a friend and they join. <0>Learn more</0>

joinText: {{appName}} helps you to send, receive, and save value on the Celo Network.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.info: In order to use our services, please read and accept our <0>User Agreement and Terms</0> by clicking the accept button below.
terms.privacy: By joining this network, you give us permission to collect anonymous information about your use of the app. Additionally, if you connect your phone number, a hashed copy of it will be stored on the Celo Network. If you grant Valora access to your contact list, Valora will import each contact's name, phone number and profile picture to allow users to connect through the Valora app. To learn how we collect and use this information please review our <0>Privacy Policy</0>.
terms.goldDisclaimer: When you create an "account" with Valora you are creating a digital wallet to which only you hold the keys. No other person or entity, including cLabs or Valora, can recover your key, change or undo transactions, or recover lost funds. Be aware that CELO, cUSD and cEUR are part of a new asset class and present a risk of financial loss. Carefully consider your financial circumstance and tolerance for financial risk before purchasing any asset. You can only send up to {{dailyLimitCUSD}} cUSD per day through Valora (the "Daily Limit"). You must contact support@valoraapp.com and provide additional, personal information to request increasing this Daily Limit. There could be a delay to conduct required compliance.

pinLostForeverMessage: You removed the screen lock, the PIN is lost

importContactsPermission.title: Import Contacts
importContactsPermission.0: Connecting your address book makes it easy to send and request payments with your friends. Otherwise, you’ll have to enter their info individually.
importContactsPermission.1: Don’t worry—connecting does not send invites to your contacts.

notReadyForCode: Not yet ready for code entry
cantVerifyRevokedAccount: This account has been previously revoked. Please create a new account and try again.

education.body1: Next, please confirm your phone number.
education.body2: Connecting your phone makes it easier to send and receive with friends. You can also skip this step and return to it later.

verificationLoading.pleaseKeepAppOpen: Please don't leave this screen or you'll have to restart
verificationLoading.card1: To make sure your phone number is really yours, we're sending you three messages.
verificationLoading.card2: Once your number is confirmed, you can send and receive funds easily to your phone number.
verificationLoading.card3: Confirming also allows you to see which of your friends are on {{appName}}.
verificationLoading.card4: We require three confirmation messages to keep your account more secure.

skipModal.body1: Confirming allows others to send value to your phone number.
skipModal.body2: Without confirmation, you can still send payments, but only using Account Addresses or QR codes.

failModal.body1: An issue has occurred while confirming your phone number.
failModal.body2: You can skip confirmation for now and try again later.
failModal.body1InsufficientBalance: Your current balance is not high enough to complete the confirmation process.
failModal.body2InsufficientBalance: Please try again when you have added funds to your wallet.
failModal.body1SaltQuotaExceeded: Your phone number lookup quota is used up
failModal.body2SaltQuotaExceeded: Please try again when you have purchased more lookups
failModal.enterCodesBody: If you already received three codes via SMS, you can still enter them.

retryWithFornoModal.body1: An issue has occurred while confirming your phone number. We recommend trying again with Data Saver mode enabled.
retryWithFornoModal.body2: Data Saver mode allows you to communicate with the Celo Network more consistently using a trusted connection.

notification.body: Receive payments directly to your phone number

quotaLookup.title: Lookup quota exceeded
quotaLookup.body1: To keep your phone number safe and private, {{appName}} limits how many phone numbers users can lookup.
quotaLookup.body2: You can purchase more lookups for a small fee.

onboardingEducation.step1: {{appName}} is a new way to send and receive value worldwide
onboardingEducation.step3: Convenient, reliable, and secure. Your phone is your wallet

welcome.title: Share money with those you value

disclosure.title: Import Contacts
disclosure.body: Valora would like to import your contacts. By tapping below, I allow access to my contacts' phone numbers, names and photos for purposes of connecting with them through Valora

pincodeSet.verify: Enter your PIN again to confirm

inviteCode.title: Invite Code
inviteCode.body: Did you receive a payment or invite? If so, please copy and paste the Invite Code below.
inviteCode.label: Invite Code
inviteCode.nodeCodeInviteLink: Don’t have an invite code? Request one at <0>celo.org/developers/wallet</0> or <1>continue without</1>
inviteCode.loadingBody: This can take up to 90 seconds

verificationEducation.title: Phone Number
verificationEducation.body:
To make sure your number is really yours, we’re going to send you three messages that will cost about 0.05 cUSD each.

Confirming your number takes about three minutes.
verificationEducation.feelessBody: Connecting takes about three minutes. To confirm your number, you’ll receive three messages.
verificationEducation.bodyInsufficientBalance:
Your current balance is not high enough to complete the confirmation process.

Please try again when you have added funds to your wallet.

verificationSkipDialog.title: Are you sure?
verificationSkipDialog.body:
Confirming allows you to send and receive funds easily to your phone number.

Unconfirmed accounts can only send payments using Celo addresses or QR codes.

verificationPrematureRevealMessage: Please wait one minute before resending

verificationLearnMoreDialog.title: Phone Numbers and {{appName}}
verificationLearnMoreDialog.body:
Confirming makes it easy to connect with your friends by allowing you to send and receive funds to your phone number.

<0>Can I do this later?</0>

Yes, but unconfirmed accounts can only send payments with QR codes or Account Addresses.

<1>Secure and Private</1>

Valora uses state of the art cryptography to keep your phone number private.

importExistingKey.explanation: Your Recovery Phrase is a 24-word phrase that you wrote down and saved when you set up your account. Please enter it here to restore your account.

verificationInput.title: Confirm
verificationInput.body: We sent you three messages (SMS). Please copy and paste them below.
verificationInput.body_ios: We sent you three messages (SMS). Please tap the link in each message to fill the codes below or copy and paste them manually.
verificationInput.body_short: We sent three codes to {{phoneNumber}}, please enter them below.
verificationInput.codePlaceholder1_ios: Tap or copy the first message
verificationInput.codePlaceholder2_ios: Tap or copy the second message
verificationInput.codePlaceholder3_ios: Tap or copy the third message

bodySection1.title: Received all three messages?
bodySection1.content:
If your messages contain a link, simply tap the links to confirm.

If there are no links, please copy and paste the messages into the fields. You’re welcome to paste the entire message.

bodySection2.title: Missing some or all messages?
bodySection2.defaultContent: If you’re having trouble receiving messages, you can skip this step for now and try again later. Sometimes it can take a few minutes for messages to arrive.
bodySection2.content_countdown: $t(verificationInputHelpDialog.bodySection2.defaultContent) The skip option below will be available in {{count}} second.
bodySection2.content_countdown_plural: $t(verificationInputHelpDialog.bodySection2.defaultContent) The skip option below will be available in {{count}} seconds.

emptyAccount.description: This account doesn’t have any funds. Would you still like to use it?
emptyAccount.title: Balance <0></0>

verificationUnavailable:
Phone number confirmation is currently unavailable. Please enter your phone number and we will notify you when it is possible to confirm again.

In the meantime, you can continue to use Valora! Payments sent to your phone number will be safely held until you redeem them by confirming your phone number.
requestUnavailableBody: The number {{e164PhoneNumber}} doesn't have an account or hasn't connected it yet. Requests can only be sent to connected numbers.
requestUnavailableNoNumberBody: Your contact doesn't have an account or hasn't connected it yet. Requests can only be sent to connected numbers.
verificationMessage: You paid a fee to connect your account. Welcome to {{appName}}!
receivedAmountFromCelo: You received this amount from the Faucet!
feeEducation: Sending payments and making exchanges include a small fee for service security and maintenance.
inviteMoneyEscrow: We’ll invite this contact and keep their funds safe until they confirm their account.
keepMoneySafe: We'll keep this money safe until your friend creates a {{appName}} account
searchFriends: Try entering a phone number if you are unable to find who you're looking for
searchForSomeone: Search for someone using their name, phone number, or address
inviteWithoutPayment: Hi! I’ve been using {{appName}} to send money worldwide. It’s easy to try and I want to invite you to check it out with this link: {{link}}
inviteWithEscrowedPayment: Hi! I’ve been using {{appName}} to send money worldwide. I just sent you {{amount}} {{token}}. Please download the {{appName}} App and redeem your {{token}} using this link: {{link}}
writeStorageNeededForQrDownload: Storage write permission is needed for downloading the QR code
cameraScanInfo: Center code in the box above
cameraNotAuthorizedDescription: Please enable the Camera in your phone’s Settings. You’ll need it to scan QR codes.

verificationCta.body: Confirm your phone and sync your contacts to quickly send to your friends.

importContactsCta.body: Please enable Contacts in your phone’s Settings to find your friends by name.

secureSendExplanation.body1: {{e164PhoneNumber}} has multiple accounts associated with it. {{displayName}} could have created a new {{appName}} account, or may have lost their phone or had their account compromised.
secureSendExplanation.body1NoDisplayName: Your contact has multiple accounts associated with it. Your contact could have created a new {{appName}} account, or may have lost their phone or had their account compromised.
secureSendExplanation.body2: You must scan their QR code or confirm their Account Address before transacting.

confirmAccountNumber.title: Confirm Account Address
confirmAccountNumber.bodyPartial: Please ask {{displayName}} for the last four digits of their Account Address. It's safest to do this in person or by phone.
confirmAccountNumber.bodyPartialNoDisplayName: Please ask your contact for the last four digits of their Account Address. It's safest to do this in person or by phone.
confirmAccountNumber.body1Full: Please ask {{displayName}} for their Account Address.
confirmAccountNumber.body1FullNoDisplayName: Please ask your contact for their Account Address.
confirmAccountNumber.body2Full: We strongly recommend asking in person or over the phone, through WhatsApp or Messenger, or by email. For security, please do not use text messaging (SMS).

helpModal.body1: Account Addresses (also known as addresses) are located in the menu. From the Home screen, open the menu by tapping the icon in the top left corner.
helpModal.body2: The Account Address is near the bottom of the menu.
helpModal.body3: Account Addresses begin with "0x" and are 42 characters long

transferAddressChanged: This contact changed their Account Address since the transaction. This payment was sent to:

encryption.warningLabel: This comment will not be encrypted
encryption.warningModalBody: Encryption ensures your comments are kept private. {{appName}} uses encryption on transaction comments when both the sender and receiver have this feature set up. Set up will normally occur automatically once a user sends their first transaction.
encryption.feeModalBody: Encryption helps keep your sensitive data private. A small one-time fee is added to your first transaction to setup encryption. This ensures your comments will be sent securely and privately.

sendToAddressWarning.title: Sending to an address
sendToAddressWarning.body:
Please make sure the address supports cUSD. Funds sent to invalid addresses may not be recoverable.

You might also consider sending a small test payment first.

action.asking: This application is asking to perform the following action

sessionInfo: This application may ask to perform the following actions:
sessionsSubTitle: The following apps are connected to {{appName}}. You can connect to more apps by scanning their QR code.
disconnectBody: Are you sure you want to disconnect from {{dappName}}?
connectionSuccess: Success! Please go back to {{dappName}} to continue

v2Unsupported: This QR code is not supported

outgoingPaymentRequestsSummaryDetails_mo: You're waiting for payments from <0></0>, <1></1> and others

whatTotalValue.title: What does Total Balance mean?
whatTotalValue.body:
Your Total Balance is an approximate sum of all your Valora assets. Your Total Balance will change as prices fluctuate. It is updated every 10 minutes.
Some tokens may not be shown in the Total Balance because the price is unavailable at the time of calculation.
